attributes.action: enforce that all ENGLAND football games can be viewed on Terresterial  free of charge and not exclusively on Setanta
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone should have the right to watch their National Football team whenever they play.  The monopoly of SkyTV and now Setanta who charge extortionate contractual rates is totally unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
